lead_paragraph: CONNOLLY--Peggy A. March 16, 2016. Of New York, NY, formerly of Buffalo, NY. Beloved daughter of John R. (late Mary) Perrin Connolly. Dear sister of John (Patricia) Connolly, Suzanne Connolly, Janellen Reznicek and the late Mary Jo Waas Connolly. Also survived by loving nieces, nephews, cousins and friends. Peg was a graduate of Buffalo State College and an accomplished professional in the fashion industry; taught at FIT in New York, enjoyed worldwide travel, music, reading, her family and the family pets. The family will be present on Friday from 3-7pm at the John E. Roberts Funeral Home (Amherst Chapel) 280 Grover Cleveland Hwy. (at Bailey) Amherst, NY 14226. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Saturday at 10am at Infant of Prague Church, 921 Cleveland Drive, Cheektowaga, New York (please assemble at church). Share condolences at www.jerfh.com. Memorial contributions may be made to a charity of choice. 1/3
